structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Regional Units Classification (NUTS 3)
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of Greek regional units (prefectures/nomoi) at NUTS 3 level for statistical purposes.

structure:Code.common:Name: Special Processing Code
structure:Code.common:Description: Special code used for data processing and layout purposes.
